info.name: NotesApi(Belejki)
info.description:
**Api that stores notes for Users**:

1. **Reminders**(stores events with expiration date)
    
2. **ShoppingItems**(stores shopping list)
    
3. **Wishlist**
    
4. **Recipes**(stores cooking recipes)
    
5. **Friendships**(adding user to friendlist and access his wishlist)

item.name: User
Authorities

request.description:
**Creates new authority for passed user id. Only users with ROLE_ADMIN can access this endpoint.**

user authority can be:

- ROLE_USER
- ROLE_ADMIN
Gets all authorities for admin users.
Finds authority by passed authority id. Only for admin users.
Finds all authorities of an existing user by passing the username of the user. Only for admin users.
Finds all authorities with the same name as the passed one.
Updates authority by passed authority id.
Deletes all authorities of an user, by passing the username.
Deletes authority by passed authority id.

item.description:
**CRUD methods for maniipulating authorities/roles for Users.**

**Only Users with ROLE_ADMIN authentication have access.**

request.description:
Creates new user. Required:

- username = valid email format
- firstName = between 2 and 24 characters long
- lastName = between 2 and 24 characters long
- password = between 8 and 64 characters long
    

This sends confirmation token/link to the email/username. The user is disabled until he visit the link.
This endpoint sends request for existing user in the database and returns JWT token for user authentication.
Updates user by passed user id.
Partial update for user by passing user id.
Gets all users. Pageable.
Lists all users not logged for 2+ years. Pageable.
Finds all users with field disabled = true.
Finds all users with field setForDeletion = true.
Finds user by passed username.
Finds user by passed user id.
Gets all users containing passed string in their first name.
Gets all users containing passed string in their last name.
Finds all users that in their first name contains the passed param for firstName and also their last name contains the passed param for lastName.
Deletes user by passing the user object.
Deletes user by passed user id.
Deletes user by passed username.
Deletes all users with setForDeletion = true field/flag.
Deletes all users not logged for more than 2 years.

item.description: Endpoints for CRUD operations for user entities

request.description: Creates new Wish item for the logged user.
Shows the wishlist of the logged user.
Finds all wish items that cointain in their description the passed string
Finds all wish items that have approximate price less than the passed long value.
Finds all wish items that have approximate price less than the passed long value.
finds a Wish by passed wish id.
Finds all Wishes for a user by passed user id. (Only for users with ROLE_ADMIN)
Finds all Wishes for a user by passed username.(Only for users with ROLE_ADMIN)
Updates a wish by passed wish id.
Updates only the passed fields of a Wish by passed wish id.
Deletes a Wish by passed wish id.
Deletes all Wishes of a user, by passed user id.(Only admin access)
Deletes all Wishes of a user, by passed username.(Only admin access)
Adds a Friend to a user.
Gets all friendships.(Only admin access)
Gets all of the logged user friendships.
gets all friendships for user by passed username(only admin access)
Deletes logged user's friendship if the passed id matches.
Deletes all friendships of a user by passed friend username.
Deletes all friendships of a user by passed username.

item.name: Ingredient

request.description: Saves new ingredient if it does not exists in the database.
Finds all ingredients.
find ingredient by passed ingredient name.
finds ingredient by passed ingredient id.
deletes ingredient by ingredient id.
deletes ingredient by passed ingredient name.
Deletes all ingredient not used in recipes.

item.description: For CRUD operations for ingredients(mostly admin access). The table exists to create RecipeIngredients.

request.description: Saves new recipe ingredient for recipe by passed recipe id.
Gets all Recipe ingredients. Pageable.(Only admin access)
finds recipe ingredient by passed recipeIngredient id.
Finds all recipe ingredients for passed recipe by recipe name.
Finds all recipe ingredients for passed recipe object.
finds all recipe ingredients for passed recipe by recipe id.
Deletes recipe ingredient by passing the recipeIngredient object.
Deletes recipe ingredient by passed recipe ingredient id.
Deletes all recipe ingredient for recipe by passing the recipe object.
Deletes all recipe ingredients for a recipe by passing the recipe id.

Saves new recipe for the logged user. Required:

- name = between 2 and 64 characters
    
- howToMake = between 10 and 4000 characters
    

ingredients:

- ingredient = between 2 and 64 characters
    
- quantity = between 2 and 64 characters
Gets all recipes (admin access)
Find recipe by id for the logged user.
Gets all recipies of the logged user.
Gets all the recipes containing the passed string in their name.(admin access)
Finds all recipes for passed user by user id.(admin access)
Gets all recipes of an user by passed username.(admin access)
Finds all recipes contained passed string in their name.
Finds all recipes contained passed string in their name.
Finds all recipes of the logged user containing the passed ingredients with params.
Finds all recipes of the logged user containing the passed ingredients with params.
Deletes recipe by passed recipe object.
Deletes recipe of the logged user by passing the recipe id.
Deletes all the recipes of an user by passed user id.(admin access)
Deletes all recipes of an user by passed username.(admin access)

Saves new reminder for logged user.

**Constraints:**

- name = between 2 and 64 characters
- importanceLevel = from 1 to 10 number value
- expiration = dd-MM-yyyy format
    
- description = not more than 128 characters (not required)
admin access
Finds all reminders of an user by passed user id.
Finds all reminders of an user by passed username.
Finds all reminders with expired = true field/flag(admin access)
Finds all reminders with expiresSoon = true field/flag(admin access)
Finds reminder of the current user by passed reminder id.
Finds all reminders of the logged user.
Finds all reminders of the logged user with expired = true field/flag
Finds all reminders of the logged user with expiresSoon = true field/flag
Finds all reminders of the logged user with expiresToday = true field/flag
Finds all reminders containing passed string in their names.
Finds all reminders containing passed string in their description.
Updates reminder by passed reminder id.
Partial update for Reminder of the logged user by passed reminder id.
Deletes reminder by passed reminder id(admin access)
Deletes all reminders of an user by passed username(ADMIN)
Deletes all reminders of an user by passed user id(ADMIN)
Deletes all reminders expired by more than 2 years.(ADMIN)
Deletes reminder of the logged user by passed reminder id.
CRUD methods for user's shopping list.
finds all shopping items for the logged user.
Finds shopping item of the logged user by passing the shopping item id.
Finds all shopping items of an user by passed user id.(ADMIN)
Finds all shopping items of an user by passed username.(ADMIN)
Deletes a shopping item by passing the shopping item object.
Deletes logged user's shopping item by passing the shopping item id.
Deletes all the shoppling items of the logged user.(clears shopping list)
Deletes shopping item from all shopping items by passing the shopping item id(ADMIN)
Deletes all shopping items for an user by passed username.(ADMIN)
